formattedAddress: 230 E 9th St 2nd FL, New York, NY 10003, USA
adrFormatAddress: 230 E 9th St 2nd FL, New York, NY 10003, USA

editorialSummary.text: Extensive tea list, unique sweets, and snacks are served a la carte or in formal tea ceremonies.

originalText.text: I came here with my good friend for dessert tasting. I am glad that my friend found out this great dessert tasting spot. This is very nice and romantic place. The service is excellent. All dessert are created and delicious. If you are a dessert lover then you should definitely come to try it out.

text.text: I came here with my good friend for dessert tasting. I am glad that my friend found out this great dessert tasting spot. This is very nice and romantic place. The service is excellent. All dessert are created and delicious. If you are a dessert lover then you should definitely come to try it out.

originalText.text: Had such a great experience! I got to try their afternoon tea experience and everyone was so sweet and kind. They kept coming over to see if I needed anything or wanted a refill on my tea. The tea snacks were amazing, especially the nama chocolate. Overall such a peaceful and yummy experience. Will definitely come for more of their future tea times.

text.text: Had such a great experience! I got to try their afternoon tea experience and everyone was so sweet and kind. They kept coming over to see if I needed anything or wanted a refill on my tea. The tea snacks were amazing, especially the nama chocolate. Overall such a peaceful and yummy experience. Will definitely come for more of their future tea times.

originalText.text:
We stopped into Cha-An on a cold rainy day which made the desserts here even more perfect. As a Japanese food and dessert lover I was ecstatic to find a place like Cha-An so close to where we were hanging out.

We ordered the hot matcha latte, dango, salmon box, anmitsu, and rosemary orange tea (not pictured).

The hot matcha latte was easily the best matcha latte I’ve had in my entire life. Let me say that again. This was the best matcha latte I’ve had in my entire life. The matcha flavor was amazing and the sweetness level was literally perfect. Paired with the cold and wet weather outside and I could not imagine a more perfect matcha experience. I still think about this latte from time to time, crushed by the fact that thousands of miles separate us.

The anmitsu was also extreme tasty. The hojicha ice cream paired well with the chewy mochi, crystal jelly, and sugar syrup. I’m not sure what the maple leaf was but it was chewy and had a very mild flavor that I didn’t particular like but didn’t mind.

The rosemary orange tea was quite interesting.

I only had a bite of the sweet yam dango but the mochi texture was amazing and had a perfect sweetness level.

I did not try the salmon box but was told it was also amazing.

Overall I was extremely satisfied with my visit to Cha-An. The flavors of everything were amazing and it has earned them a spot in my must-try NYC list. My only complaint is that the prices are fairly expensive, even for NYC standards. At the time of our visit the hot matcha latte was $15 and the anmitsu was nearly $20 for that little cup of dessert. All that being said, I 100% see myself here again the next time I’m in town.

originalText.text: was craving for a cold matcha dessert so we came here after dinner! got seated fairly quick despite coming on a friday, prime time after dinner. ordered the matcha tiramisu and affogato! both were pretty standard, nothing special. a nice dessert spot when you’re in the area, but the prices are kinda on the higher end.

text.text: was craving for a cold matcha dessert so we came here after dinner! got seated fairly quick despite coming on a friday, prime time after dinner. ordered the matcha tiramisu and affogato! both were pretty standard, nothing special. a nice dessert spot when you’re in the area, but the prices are kinda on the higher end.

originalText.text:
Beautiful and delicious hole in the wall! I loved the black sesame crème brûlée. The shave ice was okay for me but I like the toppings for it. Atmosphere is beautiful. Short wait, like 15 min.

I’m very particular about bathrooms and their bathroom is so clean and even has a bidet and heated toilet seat!
